subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: New York won for the sixth time in seven games since Mike D’Antoni’s departure as coach, but Amar’e Stoudemire and Jeremy Lin left the game in the third quarter with injuries.
snippet: New York won for the sixth time in seven games since Mike D’Antoni’s departure as coach, but Amar’e Stoudemire and Jeremy Lin left the game in the third quarter with injuries.
